remarks: A version of ~ axcc3 that uses wffs instead of classes.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Apr-2013.)
statement:
axcc4.1 $e |- A e. _V $.
axcc4.2 $e |- N ~~ _om $.
axcc4.3 $e |- ( x = ( f ` n ) -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
axcc4 $p |- ( A. n e. N E. x e. A ph -> E. f ( f : N --> A /\ A. n e. N ps ) ) $.
$d A f n x $.
$d N f n $.
$d f ph $.
$d ps x $.
